channel.title: Warframe Guides on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Warframe Guides on Warframe Blog

item.title: Warframe Baro Ki'Teer Void Trader
item.description: Hey everyone! Today I’ll be bringing you guys another Warframe guide and this time it’s going to be on the elusive void trader Baro Ki’Teer.

item.title: Thermia Fractures Event Guide
item.description: Hey guys and the Thermia Fractures Event is back once again. So, in this guide, I’m going to tell you how to do the event which will eventually give you the Opticor Vandal.

item.title: Warframe Arbitrations: Lethal Alerts Guide
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe guide article. And the Chimera update is finally here and it brought us a new alert-style game mode - Arbitrations(elite alerts / lethal alerts), featuring elite versions of endless missions with various modifiers.

item.title: Sanctuary Onslaught Guide & Rewards
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article and update 22.18 is here and it brought a bunch of new stuff. And most interesting are a new frame Khora and a new game mode called Sanctuary Onslaught about which we are going to talk about today!

item.title: Warframe Nightwave: The Wolf of Saturn Six Guide
item.description: Hey guys. As mentioned on the previous devstream Alerts are going to be replaced and now they have been. Nightwave series one is here and here’s what you need to know about the available rewards and how to get them.

item.title: Balor Fomorian Event Guide and Rewards
item.description: Hey guys and the Balor Fomorian Event is back once again. So, in this article, I’m going to tell you all about the Balor Fomorian Event and what you have to do.

item.title: Operation Plague Star Is Back. How To Kill Hemocyte
item.description: Hello everyone and today we are going to discuss some tips on defeating the newly upgraded Hemocyte boss. The last event we all complained about the boss being a copy and paste of Lephantis and also we complained that the boss was very easy to kill and that it was weak. So, DE listened to that and this time they made it harder. Now it’s much like fighting an Eidolon.

item.title: How To Get Octavia's Parts
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe guide article. And today I going to show you where to get Octavia parts.

item.title: How to get Revenant
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe guide article. And the Mask of the Revenant update is finally here and it brought us a new warframe - Revenant and a miniquest which you need to complete to get your hands on the Revenant.

item.title: Frame Fighter Guide
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe guide and Frame Fighter finally got released with Update 23.4. And in this guide I’m gonna show you guys how to unlock it and other warframes within that game mod itself.

item.title: How to get Inaros
item.description: Hey guys and today I will show you and explain how to complete Sands Of Inaros Quest and get your hands on Inaros.

item.title: How To Get Started in Plains of Eidolon
item.description:
Hey guys! Since Plains of Eidolon came out, I got a very interesting question: “would you mind doing a walk through or a “daily to do” in Cetus?

I am pretty sure some of you are overwhelmed by all the new content.. so many new farmable resources/items and so many NPC’s in Cetus with even more items and blueprints! So what I’m going to show you today is..”How to get started in Plains of Eidolon”. Without further ado, let’s begin.

item.title: 10 Ways to Earn Platinum
item.description: Warframe has one of the best free-to-play model in the market right now. You can earn almost every single item in this game without paying actual money with weapons, inventory space even cosmetics. Every single thing is out there for you to earn, that being said, it’s not easy to earn the in-game currency - platinum.

item.title: What Focus School to choose after Second Dream Quest?
item.description: Hello everyone and today I am going to answer which focus school you should pick after completing the Second Dream quest.

item.title: Unairu Focus School Explained | Abilities & Benefits
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’ll be learning more about the changes, the looks, and also the benefits that come with the final focus school Unairu!

item.title: TOP 5 Arcanes To Boost Your Damage
item.description: Hello everyone and today we are going to discuss five damage dealing arcane enhancements that will add to or amplify your raw damage in Warframe. It will be intresting for those of you who don’t care about utility or everything else. You just want more damage and more power.

item.title: How To Spawn & Defeat New Eidolons. Gantulyst & Hydrolyst
item.description: Hey everyone! Update 22.12.0 is here and with it has come two new Eidolons - Gantulyst and Hydrolyst. This is a really quick little guide to explain how to get a new Eidolons to spawn and a little bit about how to capture them if you want to.

item.title: Vazarin Focus School Explained | Abilities & Benefits
item.description: Hello everyone! I’m here to continue our guide through each focus school and I’m going to be taking a look at Vazarin Focus School and this is one of the best classes in the game.

item.title: Melee Weapons | Warframe Beginners Guide 2018
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’re going to continue our Warframe beginner’s guide and talk about choosing your melee weapon in Warframe.

item.title: Zenurik Focus School Explained | Abilities & Benefits
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’re going to be taking a look at the newly designed Zenurik Focus School, and just like the rest of the other focus schools, it comes with ten focus notes. Four of them are passives, five of them are actives, and out of all this, you also have your way bound ones which can be transferred from one focus school to the other one. Now that is of course after you max everything out and you get yourself some brilliant shards.

item.title: Affinity & Mastery Rank | Warframe Beginners Guide 2018
item.description: Hey guys! Welcomed back to the Warframe beginners guide. On this article, we will talk about leveling up and mastery rank.

item.title: Madurai Focus School Explained | Abilities & Benefits
item.description: Hello everyone! Today’s article is going to be about Madurai Focus School. Now this is a fighter focus school and everything about Madurai Focus School revolves around battle strategy, and if you can’t outsmart your opponent pure strength, it’s what will get you out of it when it comes to the Madurai Focus School.

item.title: Naramon Focus School Explained | Abilities & Benefits
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’ll be taking a look at the newly designed Naramon Focus 2.5 and this is our rogue focus school and with this most of the assassins dream can come true. But before we start, check out our articles about other focus schools.

item.title: Basic Combat and Movement | Warframe Beginners Guide 2018
item.description: Hello everyone! Welcome to a Warframe beginners guide. This is a game that I’ve played on and off for several years now. And this guide is something that I’ve wanted to do for awhile. Warframe new player experience is a bit lackluster to say at least.

item.title: How to get Nekros
item.description: Hey guys! Today I’m going to be showing you how to get Nekros in Warframe.

item.title: How to get Hydroid
item.description: Hello everyone! I’m here with a quick direction on what has to be done to get Hydroid. Now, with the hype surrounding this frame here are some step by steps that will actually help you in acquiring Hydroid without platinum purchase.

item.title: How to earn Platinum | Vault Runs
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another article. This is the first article of a little series where I want to show you how to Earn Platinum in a very fast and easy way.

item.title: How to kill an Eidolon Teralyst in Warframe
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. Today I finally want to show you how to defeat an Eidolon Teralyst in a very fast and efficient way.

item.title: Affinity Mechanic - How to Level up Correctly
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another article. Today I want to talk about the Affinity/ Experience mechanic and how to level up correctly.
